action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A plate of food with grilled chicken breast, roasted potatoes with herbs, and steamed broccoli. The plate is accompanied by a fork and knife placed to the right of the plate.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A plate of food featuring a cooked steak, several boiled potatoes with herbs, a slice of orange, and a variety of vegetables including broccoli, carrots, and a slice of carrot. The plate is on a colorful, patterned tablecloth. There is a fork and knife on either side of the plate, and a folded white napkin is placed next to the knife.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A plate of food with grilled chicken breast, roasted potatoes with herbs, and steamed broccoli. The plate is accompanied by a fork and knife placed to the right of the plate.
